issues.description: Hero headline placement 'above fold with 3-column grid' conflicts with benefit bullets also in hero - creates visual chaos
issues.rationale: Overcrowding hero section dilutes primary message impact

issues.description: Font inconsistency: Open Sans for headlines, Inter for benefits, Roboto for pricing breaks brand cohesion
issues.rationale: Multiple typefaces destroy visual hierarchy and professional appearance

issues.description: FAQ accordion 'below pricing table' buries objection handling - users may abandon before seeing it
issues.rationale: Critical objections need addressing BEFORE pricing, not after

issues.description: 3 testimonials about 'maintained control' too narrow - ignores other key objections like time savings, ROI
issues.rationale: Single-focus testimonials miss broader trust-building opportunities

issues.description: Pricing comparison chart 'after pricing hero' redundant - confuses with duplicate tier information
issues.rationale: Multiple pricing presentations create decision paralysis

issues.description: Green trust signals (#4CAF50) clash with orange primary (#FF6B35) - creates jarring visual discord
issues.rationale: Complementary colors fight for attention, reducing trust impact

issues.description: 5 customer logos 'above fold' with no context - logos alone don't communicate value or relevance
issues.rationale: Social proof needs supporting data (user count, results) to be effective

issues.description: Sticky CTA for 'consistent messaging' will annoy users and increase bounce rate
issues.rationale: Persistent elements should aid navigation, not repeat marketing messages

issues.description: Table format for 'value per tier' adds unnecessary complexity to pricing communication
issues.rationale: Tables slow comprehension - visual hierarchy works better for tier benefits

issues.description: CTA button with 'slight gradient' dated design pattern reduces perceived trustworthiness
issues.rationale: Modern flat design converts better than Web 2.0 gradients

suggestedFixes.fix: Single bold headline + subhead only. Move benefits to dedicated section below hero
suggestedFixes.rationale: Clean hero maximizes headline impact and reduces cognitive load

suggestedFixes.fix: Use Inter consistently across all text elements with weight variations for hierarchy
suggestedFixes.rationale: Single typeface family creates professional, cohesive brand experience

suggestedFixes.fix: Place 3 key objection answers directly in pricing cards as benefit bullets
suggestedFixes.rationale: Addresses concerns at decision point without adding page elements

suggestedFixes.fix: Diversify testimonials: control, time saved, revenue growth - one each
suggestedFixes.rationale: Broader proof points appeal to wider audience concerns

suggestedFixes.fix: Single pricing section with cards showing features inline - no separate comparison
suggestedFixes.rationale: Consolidated pricing reduces confusion and speeds decision making

suggestedFixes.fix: Use blue (#2563EB) for trust elements - complements orange without clashing
suggestedFixes.rationale: Blue universally signals trust and pairs well with warm orange

suggestedFixes.fix: Add metric under each logo: '2000+ users' or '30% time saved' for context
suggestedFixes.rationale: Quantified results make social proof actionable and relevant

suggestedFixes.fix: Static header with logo/nav only. Reinforce messaging at section transitions
suggestedFixes.rationale: Natural repetition at content breaks feels organic, not forced

suggestedFixes.fix: Use visual icons + short benefit statements in pricing cards, not tables
suggestedFixes.rationale: Visual hierarchy speeds comprehension and improves conversion

suggestedFixes.fix: Solid color button with subtle shadow on hover - modern and trustworthy
suggestedFixes.rationale: Clean, interactive design signals professionalism and reliability
